title: Untamed Desires
description: In the fast and furious follow up to Untamed Hearts, Gunner and Claire are forced to face the darkness that threatens to destroy them and while they aren't sure of what the future holds, one thing is for Gunner will risk everything to protect the only woman he has ever loved.Â Note To This novel contains mature content intended for readers 18 years of age or older.
author: Catherine Vale
